name: Three Holy and Great Hierarchs Basil the Great, Gregory the Theologian, and John Chrysostom
hieromartyr Hippolytus of Rome
troparia: (Tone 4) As equals to the apostles in the way you lived* and teachers of the whole world* intercede with the Master of all to grant peace to the world,* and, to our souls, great mercy.
kontakia: (Tone 2) You received Your inspired and steadfast preachers, Your chief teachers* into the enjoyment of Your good things and into repose.* You who alone glorify Your saints,* accepted their labours and death* more gladly than any holocaust.
